name: Enchanted Tower
description:
A curious knight stumbles across an Enchanted Tower...
WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Double press jump key to.. double jump. Explore the tower... can you make it all the way through? 
More levels and areas are planned if people like the game :D
CREDITS:
art: mushy
animation: mushy
graphic designer: YUJI
music and SFX sounds: Xen Machine
code: KLOVATER
